Description:
We are looking for a experience Graphic Designer to create engaging and on-brand graphics for a variety of media. The Graphic Designer job description includes the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including illustrations, logos, layouts and photos. You’ll be the one to shape the visual aspects of websites, books, magazines, product packaging, exhibitions and more.
Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. If you can communicate well and work methodically as part of a team, we’d like to meet you.
The goal is to inspire and attract the target audience.
Responsibilities

Study design briefs and determine requirements
Schedule projects and define budget constraints
Conceptualize visuals based on requirements
Prepare rough drafts and present ideas
Develop illustrations, logos and other designs using software or by hand
Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic
Work with copywriters and creative director to produce final design
Test graphics across various media
Amend designs after feedback
Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand

Requirements and skills

Proven graphic designing experience
A strong portfolio of illustrations or other graphics
Familiarity with design software and technologies (such as InDesign, Illustrator, Dreamweaver, Photoshop)
A keen eye for aesthetics and details
Excellent communication skills
Ability to work methodically and meet deadlines
Degree in Design, Fine Arts or related field is a plus

mslm focuses on producing world-class, high-quality solutions to engineering problems. It’s the bread-and-butter of our business to prioritize quality on everything we touch. Excellence is a core value that defines our culture from top to bottom.
Role Description
As a Senior Creative Designer at mslm, your job description includes the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including concept, logos, layouts, mobile applications, websites, product Interfaces, digital and print stuff.
You will be the one to shape the visual aspects of user interfaces and user experiences. Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. If you can communicate well and work methodically as part of a team, we would like to meet you.
Responsibilities
- Design screens layouts and flows for mobile apps (Android & iOS), websites, and products.
- Conceptualize visuals based on requirements
- Prepare rough drafts and present ideas
- To collaborate with the team to ensure consistency of designs across various media outlets.
- To design compelling and effective logos, Layout, mobile applications, websites, products, print, and digital media.
Requirements
- Minimum 5-6 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in a digital agency, software house or corporate environment.
- Bachelor / Master degree in Design, or relevant field.
- Experience in working with numerous different design platforms such as digital and print forms.
- Must be creative and have a good eye for details when creating the design.
- Must be strong and logical in the pre-design research process.
- Proficient with the following tools Adobe creative suite (illustrator, photoshop, indesign, acrobat and Xd).
- Must have strong command over Figma and XD.
- Strong communication, design aesthetics, conceptual thinking, typography skills, and design skills.
- Must have a portfolio of work.
- Able to work on-site at Bahria Town, Lahore.
Personality Traits We Look For
1. Team Player; liked by all immediate teammates; good character, no office politics, wants friendship with peers, is not rude or argumentative.
2. Committed; in it for the long-term and is ready to commit to the organization for many years. Does not do company shopping on a regular basis or job-hopping to get small salary increments desperately.
3. Intelligent; fast learner and adaptable. To make the best products we need the best minds.
4. Excellence; passionate about doing great and high-quality work which achieves all objectives.
5. Hard-working; knows that there’s seldom gain without some pain, and is ready to work hard to succeed, not looking for shortcuts or purely short-term success.
6. Reflective; always open to and desires honest feedback in the hopes of applying it for self-improvement.
7. Dignified; takes their work responsibilities seriously and puts their duties and responsibility above money.
8. On the same page; they too want to work with people who have the above characteristics.
Benefits
- Very competitive salary depending upon experience
- Large performance- and responsibility-based salary raises and benefits.
- Assistance is provided in moving to Bahria Town, Lahore if required.
- Cabin-oriented office space.
- All work utilities needed to be provided by the company.
- Unlimited paid time off, with a minimum of 25 business days per year.
- 1 month paid parental leave.
- All Pakistani national holidays are off.
- Flexible hours; work full-time schedule during any time of the day.
- 20% non-company intellectual growth time, allocated to Friday.

We're a SaaS-based ERP company building an innovative solution that will streamline the way businesses operate. Our mission is to empower companies with a platform that not only meets their needs but exceeds their expectations and we operate with the mantra of "No Business left behind".
As a UI/UX Graphic Designer on our team, you'll play a crucial role in bringing this vision to life. You'll work closely with our product and engineering teams to craft visually stunning and intuitive interfaces that delight our users and make their lives easier.

You have a passion for creating designs that are both beautiful and functional, and you're always up-to-date with the latest design trends and technologies. You have a strong portfolio that showcases your UI/UX design skills and a track record of delivering high-quality, user-centered designs.
Join us on this exciting journey and let's write a story together that will change the way businesses operate. We offer a competitive salary, flexible working hours, and a supportive, fun, and inclusive work environment. Apply now and let's get started!

A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work.

   Our Graphic Designers weave iconography, typography, color, space, and animation together to adorn the presentation of our brand. We believe that all of our products should not just be attractive but also accessible. As a Graphic Designer, you will captivate people with designs that inspire, engage and excite them. Job Description
As a UI/UX Developer, your primary responsibility is to design and develop intuitive, user-friendly interfaces for web and mobile applications. You will be responsible for creating wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs for the user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) of the application.
Key Responsibilities
A UI/UX designer with frontend development experience would typically have expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, which are the building blocks of modern web development. They would be able to use these languages to create responsive, interactive designs that work well across a range of devices and platforms.
Designing and developing user interfaces for web and mobile applications that are intuitive, visually appealing, and easy to navigate.
Creating wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs for the UI and UX of the application, using tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, and other similar design tools.
Conducting user research and analysis to understand user needs, behaviors, and preferences, and translating this into effective design solutions.
Collaborating with the development team to ensure that the design is implemented correctly and effectively.
Testing and refining the design to ensure that it meets usability and accessibility standards, and is optimized for performance and speed.
Staying up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to ensure that the design is current, relevant, and competitive.
Communicating with stakeholders and team members to gather feedback, identify issues, and resolve problems.
Qualifications:
To be considered for this role, you should possess the following qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Graphic Design, or related field.
Proven development experience in UI/UX design for web and mobile applications.
Proficiency in design tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, and other similar design tools.
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles, best practices, and design thinking methodologies.
Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
Experience working in an Agile development environment is a plus.
A portfolio of work demonstrating your design skills and experience.

OUR MISSION, VISION & VALUES
REZAID’S mission is to support innovators pushing boundaries. We provide clear strategies and build innovative digital products. Each customised solution is practical and intuitive to use and publicised through thoughtful and engaging social media posts. We achieve all of this by recruiting, investing and promoting the very best talent in Pakistan. Our vision is to become Pakistan’s first outsourcing technology company with 1m monthly global views. We value our team members, reward their successes, and focus intensely on customer service.
We are looking for a qualified ReactJS developer to join our IT team. Applicants who hold additional Frontend expertise are strongly encouraged to apply, as are applicants who can start immediately. You will primarily be responsible for building the ‘client-side’ of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications.
If you’re passionate about creating user-friendly interfaces through writing code and wanting to move forward in your career, then this role is perfect for you. We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design.
Ultimately, you should be able to fashion functional and attractive digital solutions that ensure outstanding user experiences.
DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
● Write “clean”, well-designed code
● Produce detailed specifications
● Troubleshoot, test and maintain the core product software and databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality
● Follow industry best practices
● Use markup languages like HTML to create user-friendly web pages
● Convert PSD Photoshop designs to HTML
● Optimize applications for maximum speed
● Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
● Create quality mockups and prototypes
● Ensure high quality graphic standards and brand consistency
QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS
● BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject.
● 3+ years of experience is preferred.
● Having front-end expertise are actively encouraged to apply.
● Proven software development experience in ReactJS.
● Understanding of open-source projects like WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, Wikis, osCommerce, etc.
● Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including ReactJS, HTML, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX etc.
● Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools, and developing web services.
● Experience of common third-party APIs (Google, Facebook, Ebay etc).
● Passion for best design and coding practices and a desire to develop new bold ideas
● Ability to meet strict deadlines.
● Punctual at work
● Should be a team-oriented person and also willing to work in isolation.
BENEFITS @ REZAID
Rezaid is committed to providing equal learning opportunities, and a quality of work-life balance to all its employees. Our standard benefits package –available to all staff- includes:
· Market-leading salary
· Additional 13th salary cheque

· Weekly lunch treats
· Performance-based bonus payments

We are looking for a dynamic UI/UX designer who will be responsible for the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design of our various digital assets. You will ensure that all elements of the online user experience are optimized for improved usability, usefulness, and exceptional visual design.
The successful candidate will evidence a passion for delivering adaptive and creative solutions to UI/UX design problems by staying up to date with best practices and emerging trends in user experience design and user interface technology.
UI UX Designer Responsibilities:

Investigating user experience design requirements for our suite of digital assets.
Developing and conceptualizing a comprehensive UI/UX design strategy for the brand.
Producing high-quality UX design solutions through wireframes, visual and graphic designs, flow diagrams, storyboards, site maps, and prototypes.
Designing UI elements and tools such as navigation menus, search boxes, tabs, and widgets for our digital assets.
Testing UI elements such as CTAs, banners, page layouts, page designs, page flows, and target links for landing pages.
Collaborating with the marketing team, and internal and external designers to ensure the creation and delivery of tailored experiences for the digital user.
Providing advice and guidance on the implementation of UX research methodologies and testing activities in order to analyze and predict user behavior.
Adhering to style standards on typography and graphic design.

UI UX Designer Requirements:

A bachelor's degree and a minimum of 2 years UI/UX design experience for digital products or services.
A portfolio of professional UI/UX design work for both web and mobile platforms.
Working knowledge of the following technologies and software: Sketch, InVision, Visio, HTML, CSS (SCSS), iOS, Android, Design Systems, and Adobe Creative Suite.
A team player but can work independently too.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Multi-tasking and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks.

OUR MISSION, VISION & VALUES
REZAID’S mission is to support innovators pushing boundaries. We provide clear strategies and build innovative digital products. Each customised solution is practical and intuitive to use and publicised through thoughtful and engaging social media posts. We achieve all of this by recruiting, investing and promoting the very best talent in Pakistan. Our vision is to become Pakistan’s first outsourcing technology company with 1m monthly global views. We value our team members, reward their successes, and focus intensely on customer service.
Rezaid is looking for an experienced creative UI/UX designer with up-to-date knowledge to interpret our clients’ needs and to design solutions with high visual impact. You will work on a variety of solutions, including websites, social media posts, corporate identity etc.
The successful candidate should have an intimate understanding of how marketing campaigns work, to support our clients. We work in a fast-paced environment, so the ideal designer will be able to hit the ground running on his/her arrival. You will be part of an established digital marketing team that includes web developers, designers, social media experts and content writers, and video editing expertise.
If you can take direction from written or spoken ideas and convert them seamlessly into images, layouts and other visually impactful designs then this role could be your ideal job, and we’d like to hear from you. We encourage applicants to share samples of their work or portfolio when applying.
Ultimately, you’ll deliver quality designs that appeal to our audiences, attract customers and boost brand awareness. You will be joining a supportive team motivated to recognise your creative skills and you will be working with an international client base across a multitude of business sectors.
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
● Work as part of a team, consulting with the marketing manager, copywriters, developers and social media experts to create cohesive designs that reflect our clients’ corporate goals
● Create visually appealing marketing materials, websites, infographics and other media
● Design with a wide range of media and graphic design software
● Think creatively to develop new design concepts, graphics and layouts
● Prepare rough drafts, present your ideas and designs
● Amend final designs to clients’ feedback, and gain full approval
QUALIFICATION REQUIREMENTS
● 2+ years of work experience as a UI/UX designer.
● Demonstrable graphic design skills with a strong portfolio
● Experience doing research using multiple sources
● Possession of creative flair, versatility, conceptual/visual ability and originality
● Hands-on experience with Adobe Creative Suite (2+ years)
● Highly proficient in all design aspects
● Ability to meet deadlines
● Excellent communication skills
● Ability to absorb and apply constructive criticism from peers and clients
● Bachelor’s Degree in Fine Art Design, Marketing or related discipline
BENEFITS @ REZAID
Rezaid is committed to providing equal learning opportunities, and a quality of work-life balance to all its employees. Our standard benefits package – available to all staff- includes:
● Market-leading salary
● Additional 13th salary cheque
● Annual salary increase
● Performance-based bonus payments
● Weekly lunch treats
● Quarterly career progression planning
● Medical coverage - OPD
● Provident Fund
● Regular social events open to all

Get To Know AimFit:


    Empowering women is at the heart of everything we do. We know in our culture that women, as primary caregivers and nurturers put their own health on the back seat to look after others. All evidence clearly points out that a health-conscious matriarch is better for the family, society, and economy. The barriers to women adopting a healthy lifestyle are real though – an absence of information, motivation, skills, spouse & family support, accessibility to places for physical activity, cost-effective services, and free time are real challenges. This is where AimFit comes in, AimFit is a fitness platform for women with a mission to make 110 million women in Pakistan the fittest in the world and change the future of our nation. We produce and distribute hyper-localized fitness content through our app and web products, targeting women and aim for our users to get hooked onto them.
  

    We raised our Seed funding round of 1 million USD in Sept 2020. You can read more about it here: https://www.menabytes.com/aimfit-seed
  

    We are hiring to expand our product engineering team. Our tech team is currently small but growing fast so stakeholders joining now can expect to have a huge contribution towards the business and enjoy significant positions and stake in the company as we grow!
  

 Job Overview:
 We are seeking a talented and creative product designer with expertise in UI/UX design, as well as website design, to join our team. As a product designer, you will be responsible for designing and developing innovative fitness solution that meet our clients' needs and help them achieve their fitness goals. You will work closely with our cross-functional teams (engineering, product and marketing) to create user-centred designs that are visually appealing, easy to use, and deliver a seamless user experience.
   


 Responsibilities:


 Work with cross-functional teams to design and develop fitness features that help our clients achieve their goals and help us achieve a product market fit.
 Conduct user research to gain insights into user needs and behaviors (UAT)
 Develop wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that effectively communicate design concepts and solutions for both mobile and web platforms
 Conduct usability testing and other user research activities to validate designs and ensure user engagement on both mobile and web platforms
 Collaborate with engineers to ensure the design is technically feasible and properly implemented
 Design and develop website pages, ensuring they are optimized for usability and accessibility.
 Continuously iterate on designs based on feedback and testing to ensure a seamless user experience
 Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, tools, and technologies related to mobile app and web design in the health and fitness industry
 Create and maintain design systems and guidelines that align with health and fitness industry standards for both mobile and web platforms
 Develop user flows, user journeys, and personas
 Collaborate with stakeholders to ensure consistency across products and platforms
 Responsible to validate first hand user experience and ensure a structured Design QA to help ship best version of the app
 Designs should be tested across different devices and platforms to ensure they are consistent, responsive and work correctly on different screen sizes and operating systems. 


 Qualifications:


 Bachelor's or Master's degree in product design, graphic design, or a related field
 3+ years of experience in product design, with a strong portfolio demonstrating your design skills and process
 Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite
 Expertise in UI/UX design principles and best practices
 Familiarity with user research methodologies and usability testing
 Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills
 Experience designing and developing websites, including a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and responsive design


 Good to have:


    Knowledge of health and fitness app development and design trends
  

    Familiarity with SEO best practices and principles
  

    Experience with no code tools such as WebFlow, Bubble.io
  

    Familiarity with web development technologies such as JavaScript, jQuery, and React is a plus.
  

    If you meet the qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, we'd love to hear from you.
  

 Benefits:


 Industry competitive salary
 Health Insurance and Stock options plan in an early stage company - we are your financial and physical wellness partner!
 Relocation expense - If you’re worth your salt, we’ll bring you in from anywhere!
 Learning & Development - free courses on Coursera, and in-house mentorship.
 AimFit Programs - safe to say you get free access to all our products ;)


 Wrapping it all up:


    At AimFit we are a young and dynamic team hungry for growth. We want AimFit to be the spearhead in the transformative fitness and wellbeing journey for millions of women around the world. With increasing proliferation of smartphones, high-speed internet connectivity, and an undeniable shift in consumer behavior, more inviting of digitization across all spheres from consumer to enterprise, we are well positioned to revolutionize the health and wellness space of this country, and play our part in building the ecosystem! You can hear more about why Pakistani startups are the next big thing by one of our esteemed investors here: https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/why-pakistani-startups-next-big-thing-aatif-awan/Our product and business model gives us a unique strategic advantage and opportunity to quickly expand all across MENAP, South-East Asia and beyond. As demonstrated by Spotify's synchronous launch in 100 countries including Pakistan recently, digital content can quickly transcend borders and we’re gearing up to do exactly that. If you are interested in witnessing and contributing first hand to the process of product-market fit and scaling a business, you might just find home with us!

We are looking for a Senior Web Developer to build and maintain functional web pages and applications.

Ultimately, you will ensure our web applications are up and running and cover both internal and customer needs.

Work experience as a Senior Web Developer

Understanding with DevOps
Experience with mockup and UI prototyping tools
Understanding of security practices

Team management skills
BSc/MSc in Computer Science or relevant field

Overview:
We are seeking a creative and talented Sr.Social Media Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating engaging social media content that aligns with our brand and target audience.
Responsibilities:

Develop and execute social media content strategy across multiple platforms, including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Pinterest, YouTube, and TikTok
Create and curate content that is visually appealing, on-brand, and engaging
Collaborate with the SEO Content Writer and Designer team to ensure social media content aligns with our overall strategy and to provide feedback on designs
Supervise the designers to create effective and appealing designs for social media campaigns
Provide ideas and content to the designer for new campaigns for social media
Monitor social media channels and respond to comments and messages in a timely and professional manner
Track and analyze social media metrics to measure the success of campaigns and identify areas for improvement
Monitor social media channels for trends and opportunities to engage with our audience
Plan and execute social media advertising campaigns to reach new audiences and promote our brand
Conduct social media audits to evaluate our performance and identify areas for improvement
Stay up-to-date with social media platform updates and changes to algorithms
Collaborate with influencers and other brands to expand our reach and engagement
Create video content for social media platforms such as TikTok or YouTube
Respond to customer inquiries and complaints in a professional and timely manner.

Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field
2+ years of experience in social media content creation
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their best practices
Excellent writing and communication skills
Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Canva or Adobe Creative Suite
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines

Educative is looking for an extraordinary Visual Designer to help us delight current and potential users, ensuring we have a polished and premium aesthetic across all user touchpoints.
  


 This is an excellent role for candidates that have 3+ years of relevant experience and are excited about using their skills alongside technical course creation team to build an innovative upcoming brand in Ed-tech.
  



You will:


 Create original, premium-quality illustrated visuals and assets for online technical courses.
 Bring fresh ideas on teaching technical content using illustration
 Review technical courses, prior to launch, ensuring aesthetic appeal of illustrations and adherence to quality standards
 Stay up to date on best practices and new initiatives in the industry and contribute to putting Educative on the forefront of visual design.






You have:


 3+ years in professional commercial design making customer-facing graphics or illustrations
 Proficiency with Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop
 Ability to prioritize and work on multiple design projects simultaneously based on rapidly evolving business needs. The company is a fast-growing tech company with an international presence, so agility is key.
 Excellent communication skills, as well as the ability to clearly understand the needs and objectives of the multifunctional team and ‘talk through’ design decisions.






About Educative:


    Educative is a hands-on learning platform for software developers of all levels. We were founded by industry veterans who understand first-hand the problems developers face staying on the cutting edge of modern technology. Educative's interactive, text-based courses are built to teach you the skills employers are looking for. We provide tools like in-browser coding environments and interview-focused assessments to help you practice as you learn.
  


 Educative is connecting millions of developers worldwide to become a developer, grow their skills, or prepare for an interview.
  


 Our learners rely on us to create engaging courses to get better at their job, find a better job, or experience the joy of learning. With the courses that you create, learners can maximize their success.

Job description
 servicePath is an innovative provider of commercial software for IT Service Providers, specifically Managed Services and Cloud Computing providers. We are looking for a top-notch expert in Microsoft Word and Excel for its Technical Services Group.
 This is an opportunity for a Document/Presentation Designer to work for a Global Business process outsourcing company. 
The Document Designer will be expected to work collaboratively alongside the client, members of the Document Design Team, the Creative Director, and the Management Team, to drive quality and creativity and to help inspire and innovate the creative service offered to the client. 
The role requires a high level of understanding and anticipation of the clients needs and expectations. The Document Designer will be expected to advise the client and implement the best solutions to their visual communication needs by producing highly creative, comprehensive graphics and designs that support the brand using predominately Microsoft PowerPoint. We are looking for a talented designer who shares our ambitious plans now and for the future and is also keen to develop their own skills and experiences.
 Responsibilities:
 Take briefs from clients whilst advising them on the best possible style and layout for work within corporate guidelines.
 Create high-level concepts, designs, and innovative ideas for design, print, and electronic deliverables within the client brand.
 Design and production of templates and graphics including proposals, brochures, animated presentations, infographics, and diagrams.
 Demonstrate creativity alongside an eye for design and layout to enhance client documents.
 Ensure all quality review checklists are completed and standards are maintained.
 Proactive in self-development, using training materials and resources provided.
 Keeps up to date with any changes to the client's brand guidelines.
 Strong job and project management skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks or projects and prioritize accordingly
 Essential Skills:
 Advanced Microsoft Word skills to produce highly creative printed and onscreen work, specially but not limited to:
 Formatting documents
 Styles-based formatting.
 Create new and edit existing styles.
 Bookmarks
 Efficient Use of Bullets and Tables
 Proofreading with Microsoft tools
 Incorporating graphs or charts into reports or other documents
 Detail-oriented and Strong attention to details
 Figure out minor details in the documents provided by the clients.
 Find out any mismatches in the documents generated by the product.
 Strong level of technical and creative design knowledge
 Excellent communication and organizational skills with the ability to prioritize an often conflicting workload
 Excellent customer relationship management skills
 Project management skills include consulting with clients, whilst advising on conceptual ideas.
 Strong time management skills, and the ability to juggle more than one project at a time.
 Intermediate/Advanced skills in Adobe Acrobat Professional, particularly in creating PDFs that are print ready.
 Ability to use your own initiative to overcome problems that may arise.
 Excellent communications skills:
 Ability to interpret the brief, understand client requirements, and provide appropriate solutions
 Demonstrate a client-focused attitude with good people skills, able to negotiate effectively and present ideas in an easy-to-understand way.
 Ability to manage client expectations.
 Ability to liaise at all levels (client, team, manager, and IT)

 Desirable Skills:
 Knowledge of Creative Suite Packages (Illustrator/Photoshop)
 Experience working in a Creative Studio environment.
 An active interest in new industry trends, emerging technologies, and innovation

Responsibilities and Requirements:

Strong knowledge of object-oriented design, design patterns, 3D Math, linear algebra vector math, and associated data structures.
Expert knowledge of Unreal including GUI, asset bundles, and materials/shaders.
Strong knowledge in 3D graphics development (Particle Systems, Shaders) and performance optimization within game development.
Strong knowledge of matrix algebra, trigonometry, and computational geometry essential.
Detailed knowledge of C#/C++ essential.
Ability to implement the existing script and/or visual scripting modules into optimized and economic code within Unity and/or Unreal.
A good sense of creating and maintaining code bases that are accessible and modular. Willing to help lead the development path for creative development solutions for the overall development pipeline and individual projects.
Strong knowledge of version control systems such as Perforce. Understanding of Maya and Python tool development advantageous.
Experience with shader development in Unreal advantageous Fast, organized, take direction well, and can deal with high-profile directors, VFX supervisors, and production designers.
Strong organizational and communications skills along with understanding production values, deadlines, and priorities Willing to take direction and be a team player.
Strong knowledge of OOP.
5+ years of experience.

Annual increment
Performance based bonus
In-house training
In patient coverage
Annual Trips
24 paid leaves
Day care facility

Provident Fund
Marriage Bonus
Flexible working hours
